DOC.brief_summary: For HBeAg ( + ) hepatitis B patient treat entecavir 48 week without HBeAg loss , switch peg-interferon may increase response rate . In investigator study , patient divide two group . In Group A , patient continue entecavir another 72 week . In Group B , patient switch peg-interferon-2a monotherapy 48 week , follow 24 week .
DOC.brief_title: Efficacy Peg-interferon α-2a Hepatitis B Patients Treated Entecavir Without HBeAg Loss
DOC.detailed_description: For HBeAg positive hepatitis B patient treat entecavir 48 week without HBeAg loss , switch peg-interferon may increase response rate . In study , patient without HBeAg loss 48 week entecavir treatment divide two group . In Group A , patient continue entecavir another 72 week . In Group B , patient switch peg-interferon-2a monotherapy 48 week , follow 24 week .
DOC.criteria: Age 18 50 year old HBsAg ( + ) HBeAg ( + ) 6 month entecavir treatment Treated entacavir 48 week HBeAg seroconversion Pregnant woman Decompensated liver disease Combination infection HCV , HAV , HEV Combination infection HIV Any contraindication interferon α
